docs.title: Home
docs.text: Leaf is an advanced Discord bot written in Python.

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Python/Pip
  • Git
  • Poetry
  • PostgreSQL (optionally pgAdmin to view your database with a UI)

If you do not have Poetry already installed, run the following command:

$ pip install poetry

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository to a local directory.
$ git clone https://github.com/mudkipdev/leaf
$ cd leaf
  1. Install all the dependencies using Poetry. If poetry is not recognized, make sure you have selected "add to PATH" when installing Python.
$ poetry install

That's it! You have completed the installation. Now move on to the running section.

docs.title: Running
docs.text:
1. Once you have completed the installation, make sure you enter Poetry's virtual environment.
$ poetry shell
  1. Now you can run the bot. Make sure the database is running as well.
$ python leaf
